import React from 'react' import './ProductDisplay.css' import star_icon from '../Assets/star.png' import star_dull_icon from '../Assets/dull_star.png' const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product} = props; return (

{product.name}

(198)

${product.old_price}
${product.new_price}
Stay stylishly warm with our Chic Denim Fur Jacket, the perfect fusion of edgy denim and luxurious comfort. This jacket features a classic medium-wash denim exterior, complemented by a plush faux fur lining that extends to the collar and cuffs, providing a touch of glamour and extra warmth.

) } export default ProductDisplay
